LearningItemSubmission.name: LearningItemSubmission
LearningItemSubmission.description: Represents a link to a resource, such as a video recording, that a user submits as part of a Feedback Request exercise in an Enablement program. For peer and manager feedback, this resource can be a recording of a user’s sales patch. For Einstein Coach feedback, this resource can be a video call, and Einstein generates feedback from the call’s transcription.

CallId.description: The ID of the video call that a user submits for Einstein Coach feedback. Einstein generates feedback for the user based on the call’s transcription. This field is a polymorphic relationship field. Available in API version 61.0 and later.

LearningItemId.description: The ID of the LearningItem record for the Feedback Request exercise, where the Type of the learning item is LearningPractice. This field is a relationship field.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the learning item submission. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

Url.description: URL of the content that a user submits for peer and manager feedback. For example, a link to a video recording of a sales rep’s practice pitch.

LearningItemSubmission.accessRules: A learning item submission record is created when users take an Enablement program that includes a Feedback Request exercise for peer and manager feedback.
